t: This versatile Amazon tee is the perfect lightweight top for transitional weather
s: March 18, 2025 - One of my favorite things about this shirt is how incredibly lightweight and soft the fabric is. The brand says it's made with a blend of polyester, rayon and spandex, which I found to be so comfy — like I was wearing a casual cotton tee.
